entry.question: If I have a character upgraded with more than one Attack Drone and I play another Weapon, what happens?
entry.answer: All the Attack Drones in the character’s weapon slot are scrapped.

entry.question: If I form a Combiner while one of the component pieces is equipped with three Attack Drones, am I allowed to transfer all three to the combined form, or just one?
entry.answer: In this scenario, you can transfer all three Attack Drones.

entry.question: If I start my turn with 3 Attack Drones and a Sparring Gear on General Megatron, does that count as 4 Upgrades (Meaning each Attack Drone counts, and therefore trigger his ability), or only 2, since only 2 slots are filled?
entry.answer: Yes, each Attack Drone counts individually, so that is 4 upgrades, triggering General Megatron’s bot mode ability.
